mapper.insert: insert into livingroom (imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, price, saveFileName) values (#{imageIndex}, #{productName}, #{cateEn}, #{cate}, #{price}, #{saveFileName})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from livingroom where productName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select nvl(count(*),0) from livingroom where cateEn=#{cateEn} and productName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price, saveFileName from livingroom where cate like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' or productName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' order by imageIndex desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
